description:
Through a Witch`s Cultist`s conference mirror, Emilia tells Al where the Sin Archbishops are and asks him to protect Beatrice. Al relays Emilia`s message to Subaru, and the gang begins to devise a strategy to win back the control towers.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Bohater od zawsze i bohater od teraz
Der neueste und der älteste Held
El héroe más nuevo y el héroe más antiguo
Le nouveau héros et le plus ancien héros
Mottomo Atarashii Eiyuu to Mottomo Furui Eiyuu
The Newest of Heroes and the Most Ancient of Heroes
最も新しい英雄と最も古い英雄
